bitals sangitha kandayame jorj harisan ohugen sitharaye nirmanashilithwaya hadara ‚Äúnorwijiyan wud‚Äù ha ‚Äúwidin yu withawut yu‚Äù yana githa sandaha sitharaye handa yoda ganima ema githa mahath janapriyathwayata path wimata hethu wiya.niwiyok nagaraye suprakata kanagi shalawe ha woshintanaye kenadi madhyasthanaye thama sitharaya handawa udwegathara janapriyathwayakata path wu rawi shankar landanaye ha niwyok nagarawala filar monik sangitha kandayama samanga sankalana sangitha sandhwaniyak nirmanaya kirimath yehudi menuyin sangithawediya samanga kala nirmanayan athuren mul nirmanayata grami sammanayak himi wima ohuge sangitha diwiye thawath athi wishishta jayagrahanayak wanneya.aasiyawath, batahirath thama sitharaye thathwalin ekthan kirimata samath wu rawi shankar sangithawediya chithrapata sangithaya kerehi da yomu wu bawa sathyajith rayi ge apu thrithwayata menma richad atanbaroge ‚Äúgandhi‚Äù chithrapatayata ha hindi chithrapata kihipayakata sangithaya sapayimen dakwiya hakiya.indiyawe usasma sammanaya wu ‚Äúbharatha rathna‚Äù sammanayen pidum labu rawi shankar ‚Äújathika nidhanayak‚Äù lesatath ‚Äúindiyanu sanskruthika urumaye wishwamaya thanapathi warayaku‚Äù lesatath indiya agamathi manmohan sin wisin handunwalima indiyawe ha loka sangitha kshethraya wetha himi karagena thibu athi wishesha sthanaya sanatha karanu labayi.ohuge maranaya siduwana awasthawe ohu asala waidyawarun ha shalya waidyawarun ohuge jiwithaya bera ganimata mahath uthsahayak darubawa rohale ohu asala siti ohuge birinda sukhanya ha diyaniya anushka pawasuha.‚Äùme awasthawa duka shokaya sandaha wen kala yuthuwa athath ohu apage jiwithaye kotasak bawata thabagatha hakiwima gana apa sthuthi wantha wiya yuthuya.
